p: The extracted EOs of the Saudi and Egyptian samples of C. procera were tested against some pathogenic strains of bacteria according to the technique of agar diffusion method [ 73], as well as fungal strains using the spore suspension method [ 74]. The tested bacterial strains were obtained from the American Type Culture Collection. They included either Gram-positive ( S. aureus ATCC23235, S. pyogenes ATCC19615, and S. epidermidis ATCC12228) or Gram-negative ( S. typhi ATCC35664, E. coli ATCC25922, Shigella spp. ATCC12040, and P. aeruginosa ATCC15442) bacteria, while T. shoenlenii ATCC22776 and A. fumigatus ATCC13073 were the tested fungi.
